message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000. This is a great deal, considering the product's worth to you is $1200000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was hoping we could work out a better deal. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1350000. This is still a great deal for you, considering the product's value to you is $1200000. Plus, I'm willing to throw in some additional features that will make the product even more valuable to you. What do you think?

I understand your additional features are valuable, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1250000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value it holds for me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1250000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $1290000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to you and the additional features I'm offering. What do you think?

I understand you're willing to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more offer: $1220000 for the product. This is the highest I'm willing to go, considering the value it holds for me. I hope we can come to an agreement.
